name: Jerga Boriqua
description:
Working on a fun project exploring Boriqua identity through the eyes of someone disconnected from their culture. A fun game with cute girls, a talking cat and education on Boriqua dialect. 

Prototype, if it goes well eventually I'll update with my own assets

Comments and feedback welcome! My plan is to make 2 maybe 3 romance options based on responses to quizzes about words and other questions.
